title: C303 - RevaturePRO - Java Programming
course_objectives: Ability to write a program to solve specified problems using the Java SDK environment.
To create, debug and run Java programs. To implement the concept of java database connectivity.

tasks.name: Apply Inheritance - Class, Abstract class, Interface,
Implement Polymorphism - Method Overloading and Method Overriding
Apply Collections with Generics ( List, ArrayList,Set, Map ,HashMap etc.)
Implement Searching and Sorting operations using Collections API
Implement Validations and implement exception handling using try/catch/finally block
Write JDBC API for CRUD Operations
